author: yuanchao
body:
#### PR description:

Requested during the AlCa meeting on May 8, adding comparison plots for two different tags JetCorrector payload inspector. Correction level and jet parameters can be set through the input parameter interface of PI.

#### PR validation:

Local tests with getPayloadData.py script.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is not a backport.
title: Adding a comparison plot on two tags for JetMET JEC PI
